name: beautiful dogs for all kids - free game
name_original: beautiful dogs for all kids - free game
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8).

This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
In this game, your child will be keen to show and also skilful. Targets appear and you must hit them throwing a dart. Be careful not to use all your darts. To win the level your child should exceed the score to beat.

Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful a dog picture becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
In this game your child drives a vehicle. The goal is to collect as many blue balls without touching the red balls. This is both a game of skill and speed.

Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful a dog picture becomes available in the image gallery.

Features:
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of dogs.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of dogs to release.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
